problems.title: Replace The Substring For Balanced String (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Return the minimum length of the substring that can be replaced to make the string balanced (each of 'Q', 'W', 'E', 'R' appears n/4 times).

Input Format:
First line: string s.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the minimum length.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
